page.title: 05STUART LOW CO LTD-ENFIELD
page.content: In contrast to Woldens,Stuart Low are Wholesale Nurserymen,and have been in Theobalds Park Road for 25 years.The site occupies 13 acres and consists mainly of glasshouses growing house plants.There is some housing for staff on the site. All plants are grown indoors from seed or plants imported from America,Italy or Holland. The glasshouses are heated by oil and controlled by computers. Watering is by hosepipe and lighting is controlled. Stuart Low employs 135 people for the work of planting,potting,watering and sending the plants to market.There are 12 lorries for transporting the plants and other items which include flowers, ribbons,books,baskets,plant foods, tonics and sprays,as well as plant pots.The working hours are from 8.00am to 5.30pm or 7.00pm.
